newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch - June 9.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch - June 9.

text.p: -- SAFECO is expected to announce that it has agreed to buy American States Financial Corp for about $2.82 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported. SAFECO shares closed up 1-1/2 on Friday at 45-1/4.

-- Cablevision Systems Corp is near a deal to acquire some New York-area customers from Tele-Communications Inc in a deal valued at about $1 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported. Cablevision shares rose 3/4 to 34-5/8 Friday.

-- Microsoft Corp is nearing a deal to invest about $1 billion in cable company Comcast Corp, which would give the software giant a foothold in controlling and distributing television programming, according to published reports.
